author: Filmento
description:
Save up to 40% off Ridge products right now with my sponsored link https://ridge.com/film

The Gorge is a new Apple TV monster action thriller where Miles Teller needs to guard a mysterious gorge full of monsters with Anya Taylor-Joy, both expert snipers. And although the movie is full of awesome elements, it fails to make a big enough impact to stay with the audience, being pretty forgettable. So today, let's go through the movie find out why.
